official_title: A bill to provide for the transfer of the Coast Guard cutter RARITAN to the city of Grand Haven, Michigan, for use as a maritime museum and display.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to convey, without compensation, the Coast Guard cutter "Raritan" to the city of Grand Haven, Michigan, for use as a maritime museum and display.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of the Coast Guard cutter RARITAN to the city of Grand Haven, Michigan, for use as a maritime museum and display.
